Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Ohio
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand & Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
